TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. There Much More cheaper,but once you get on your flight to orlando,it Crash lands into jurrassic park,and all the crew and passengers get eaten by a T-Rex.

I wish I could Land on Mars with Dragon V2 rocket..

Edited October 4, 2014 by Guest

Granted. It undergoes hasty unintentional lithobraking on landing that results in rapid unplanned disassembly of the lander and a loss of crew.

I wish I could into space.

granted, now you suffocate and die

I wish I were space

Granted, but only for a split-second.

I wish for more wishes that are corrupt, because I feast on corruptness.
granted. all creatures are turned into wishes to be corrupted

Granted. Just like your wish itself, the effects are unobservable.

I wish for a deeper understanding of the neurological bases of cognition.

Granted. You now have a degree in neurology, but the knowledge can only be applied to the removal of people's brains.

I wish for green to eat blue.

Green is now blue.

I wish for the ability to change the weather to my personal preferences.

granted, you are hunted down by the government and become the target of conspiracy theories and then given a job for TV

i wish i was capable of creating the greatest quotes of all time

granted. you find out that they were already made.

I wish for flying cars to be cheap

You wish for something.

I wish I could accurately predict how stocks will lose or gain value.

Granted. By using this, you make so much money that nobody else has any money.

I wish it wasn't so hot that I can't even think properly.

Granted,Now It Isnt So hot and all around you and you too,get freezing cold and run inside to warm up

I wish the hypetrain arrived at my station at KSC.

Granted but the hypetrain crashes leaving you with a broken KSC that you must pay 1 billion funds to repair.

I wish i could land on the mun.

Granted, but your ascent engine is destroyed when you land.

I wish for more time in the evening.

Granted, but there's no morning, and therefore, no bacon to eat with sausage.

I wish for Bacon, even if it kills me.

Granted, but it kills you before you get to eat it =O

I wish to understand all the references!

The amount of references overloads your brain.

I wish for future Ebola immunity.

Granted. You have no current ebola immunity though, and become patient zero in England.

I wish anti-vaccination people would keep their ignorant views to themselves.

Granted, but without any relation, the world is now ruled by creationist-dictators. Also those who think the Earth is round are executed :-p

I wish for 4 tuna cans. Srsly I just ate all my tuna and now I have nothing to put my computer on, so it will receive cooling from beneath.

Granted,But the tuna come alive and eat your soul.

I wish to be the HypePlane/Train pilot.

P.S Squad posted a post on their FB page that the hype train is really indeed happening,there gonna release 0.25 SOONER THAN EVER BEFORE!

Granted. The hype train and hype plane explodes.

I wish to be the HypeSubmarine pilot (because why not?).

Granted, but you have a K-19 incident and you drown.

I wish my shuttle wasn't so good.

Granted It sucks, it's ugly and you absolutely hate it. But everyone else loves it and it's been featured on the Daily Kerbal. And now, for everyone the name "General Rarity" is associated with this hideous shuttle xD

I wish to update my game.

Granted. They updated it to a very sloppy game.

I wish for a sloppy game.
